name: GRAVITY GLITCH
description:
SD - move

WD - Change gravity

As you might know this game was made under 48 hours (8 hours 16 minutes) and yea. I'm happy at how it turned out, my only regret was not making more levels. But hey, now I know for next time.

I want to hear any suggestions so just leave a comment and I'll check it out

P.s the misspelt ending at the end on purpose because it’s a little reference to an old nes game
